subject: Damp cold settling in on the harbor
headline: Keeping dry inside while the heavy fog rolls in
body: Outside is sitting at a damp 44° with 90% humidity. Likely fog on the beach road today, so keep your headlights on if you leave the island. The greenhouse is tight, holding 67° without trouble. Ghost season is in full swing here. It's quiet on the bypass, just how we like it.
